title: Al Hayyat Group Of Companies
description:
Al Hayyat Group is a Real estate DevelopmentConstruction,
marketing, sales, and investment portfolio management company. Having a clear
vision to bridge the gap between the innovative real estate market and the
local client. As Peshawar is lacking in the infrastructure sector. Our company
tries to fill that gap by initiating innovative projects of the best architecture
and development throughout the province.The mission of Al Hayyat Group of Companies is to achieve
the best in every project by implementing extraordinary, innovative architecture,
with the best experience for our clients, while keeping in mind not to lose sight
of their satisfaction. We improve the industry of real estate through developmental work by bringing the investors to one platform while keeping
their trust with our honesty and integrity.

description:
Centrum International is a real estate company in
PakistanThey provide a variety of real estate services to clients. If you are
a property owner or a buyer, we value your business and provide you with top-notch
services. Our team of professionals is committed to excellence, professional

to turn the current path of real estate in Pakistan towards a high-tech infrastructure.

title: Elad boutique Ecommerce CRM
description:
Elad boutique is a CRMWebsite portal developed by professionals of Exytex technologies. This platform
is made by analyzing what each customer does on this site and maintaining the
data in a contact record. It also provides a business to engage with them on
that behavior. It allows its users to promote and grow their business using
that platform and easily track all communications and relationships with their
leads and clients.By integrating a CRM system, a business can enhance
visitors’ experiences through personalization, marketing,  customer support, and streamlined processes.
